articles.title: 10 pro tips: how to work with production databases
articles.summary: The goal here is get what you need done as quickly as possible and keep rolling. "Move fast and break things. Unless you are breaking stuff, you are not moving fast enough." - Mark Zuckerberg. 1. Connect to your production databases using the same tool you use for development. There's no need to...
